item.title: Hallmarks everywhere
item.description: Required Please read the Overview for the course and familiarize yourself with the content at OWL. Please read the Resources for the course. The Hallmarks of Cancer D. Hanahan and R. Weinberg (2000) Cell 100 (1) Hallmarks of Cancer: the Next Generation D. Hanahan and R. Weinberg (2011) Cell 144 (5) Hallmarks of Cancer: New Dimensions D. Hanahan (2022) Cancer Discov (2022) 12 (1): 31â€“46.

item.title: Orientation and the first 6 hallmarks
item.description: Readings should be completed before the actual lecture. The lecture itself is intended to provide a deeper exposition of the material and provide additional insight. Required Please read the Overview for the course and familiarize yourself with the content at OWL.1 Please read the Resources for the course. The Hallmarks of Cancer Hanahan and Weinberg (2000) Cell. Volume 100, Issue 1. Recommended Consider the two textbooks The biology of cancer, 2nd edition from R.
